price: ߏ߬ ߓߍ߯ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏߖߎ߯ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߜߏߡߊ߲ߓߊ ߦߴߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߦߋ߫
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
